sentences.sContent: He has tried to impose solutions to the country's problems by fiat.
sentences.sCn: 他已经试图采取强制性法令来解决该国的问题。

remMethod.val: fi(看作fire) + at → 对…开火 → 政令

trans.tranCn: 命令, 法令, 许可, 批准
trans.tranOther: an official order given by someone in a position of authority, without considering what other people want
